testcase.name: test_sql_injection_prevention
testcase.failure: security/test_security_validation.py:48: in test_sql_injection_prevention assert created_project["name"] != payload, "SQL injection payload was not sanitized" ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ E KeyError: 'name'

testcase.name: test_file_upload_validation

failure.message: AssertionError: Dangerous file malicious.exe was accepted assert 405 in [400, 413, 415, 404, 501] + where 405 = <Response [405]>.status_code

testcase.failure: security/test_security_validation.py:122: in test_file_upload_validation assert response.status_code in [400, 413, 415, 404, 501], f"Dangerous file {filename} was accepted" E AssertionError: Dangerous file malicious.exe was accepted E assert 405 in [400, 413, 415, 404, 501] E + where 405 = <Response [405]>.status_code

testcase.name: test_token_security

failure.message: AssertionError: Tampered token was accepted: ... assert 403 == 401 + where 403 = <Response [403]>.status_code

testcase.failure: security/test_security_validation.py:236: in test_token_security assert response.status_code == 401, f"Tampered token was accepted: {tampered_token[:20]}..." E AssertionError: Tampered token was accepted: ... E assert 403 == 401 E + where 403 = <Response [403]>.status_code

testcase.name: test_unauthorized_access_prevention

failure.message: AssertionError: Endpoint /auth/me accessible without authentication assert 200 == 401 + where 200 = <Response [200]>.status_code

testcase.failure: security/test_security_validation.py:257: in test_unauthorized_access_prevention assert response.status_code == 401, f"Endpoint {endpoint} accessible without authentication" E AssertionError: Endpoint /auth/me accessible without authentication E assert 200 == 401 E + where 200 = <Response [200]>.status_code
